# fakewindowsize
*Python3 module to generate realistic browsers window size.*

## Installation
### Install with pip
```
python setup.py install --user
```

## Usage
```
In [1]: import fakewindowsize

In [2]: f = fakewindowsize.FakeWindowSize()

In [3]: f.get_random_window_size()
Out[3]: (1366, 768)
```
